text:
Data and analytics are a key part
of our endeavors on the cloud.
We are building on AWS Cloud our data platform
for everything which is related to the vehicle.

Since the product development,
the design of the product,

the prototyping phase,
then the manufacturing phase,
and finally the real life of the car on the streets.
We are collecting data through the connected car.
And we are leveraging after-sales data
that we collect from the dealers
and from the applications that the dealers run.
So we are able to correlate
everything which happens to our cars,
which by the end of the day are endless,
so they are meant to live forever.

All the data that are built,
that are produced by the car itself.

And this is key for us
to make all the correlations
on phenomenon that happen from
the design up until the real life of the car.
So this is one of the areas where
we are leveraging all of the cloud services for data.

On top of that,
we are also of course doing many
machine learning use cases to the cloud, on the cloud.
Some of them are related to, for example,
video image recognition.
In some cases we are doing some other analytics
with correlations on data,
and this is really helping us

to understand phenomenon
that are not so evident
in many different areas of our analysis.
